fields.label: Jump Links Title
fields.name: fad_jump_links_title
fields.instructions: When a page has a list of jump links (a.k.a. anchor links), this title defines the text used in the list"s heading. If you leave this blank, the default title will be used.

fields.label: Default Clinical UAMS Brand Organization
fields.name: fad_default_brandorg_clinical
fields.instructions: Select the most specific UAMS brand organization to associate with every provider and location in schema data properties relevant to clinical practice by default.

fields.label: Default UAMS Brand Organizations as Affiliations
fields.name: fad_default_brandorg_affiliation
fields.instructions: Select the most specific UAMS brand organizations to list in the affiliations for every provider and location in schema data properties by default.

fields.label: Default UAMS Brand Organizations to Credit
fields.name: fad_default_brandorg_credit
fields.instructions: Select the UAMS brand organizations to credit as the creator for all creative works on the website by default. In order to

fields.label: Default UAMS Brand Organizations as the Locations Where the Website and Its Contents Were Created
fields.name: fad_default_brandorg_locationcreated
fields.instructions: Select the UAMS brand organization(s) to credit as the default location(s) where all creative works on the website were created. In order to generate valid schema data, the schema type or subtype of the selected organization(s) must also be a subtype of Location.

fields.label: Default UAMS Brand Organizations as Copyright Holder
fields.name: fad_default_brandorg_copyright
fields.instructions: Select the UAMS brand organizations to indicate as the default copyright holder for all creative works on the website.
